headline.main: GERMANS BLOW HOT AND COLD AT U.S.; Roosevelt Is Attacked But Formal 'Pretext' For War Is Avoided

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 25 -- A manifest crescendo in the vituperations of the German press propaganda against American statesmen is coupled with assiduous efforts of official Germany to avoid any incidents that might offer the United States a formal "pretext" for declaring war upon Germany.
abstract: German press propaganda against U S statesmen revd; formal pretext for war avoided by Hitler and press
